On Mon, 2003-11-10 at 19:17, Sean Machin wrote:
> Hi All,
> 
> I'm trying to think of a good way to test some Java apps. that are
> launched by WebStart.  I've setup some basic tests with HTTPUnit
> that go to the launch page, follow each WebStart link and ensure
> that a valid JNLP file is retrieved for each simulated
> link click.  What I'd really like to do is to actually load
> each app, get past the login screen and verify each
> app's main frame is bought up without any database exceptions etc.
> 
> Can anyone advise on how best to accomplish this?

I am not familiar with WebStart, but could you pass the username and
password along on the web address?  Eg. http://userid:passwd@...

=jason
